website_summaries.verdict: This water bottle makes it possible for you to share water with your dog without having to drink from the same spot.
pros: Bowl attaches to the water bottle and can flat on the ground for your dog to use for drinking
Wide mouth makes it easy to put in ice cubes
Tray is a decent size, even for bigger dogs
cons: This bottle does not come with a clip or a strap

customer_reviews.title: Very handy for traveling with your dog
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient bottle and bowl design for traveling with your smallish dog. Probably not big enough for a large dog, though the 1 liter size would definitely be better. The bottle is a quality product made from BPA free plastic. The lid seals well and I have not had a leaking problem rattling around in my car. The bowl stays clean due to the bowl opening being snug against the bottle. It’s definitely not an air tight seal, but does a good job staying clean except for fine dust. I would definitely buy another one if the need arises, though I think this one will last a very long time. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: FrankW

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: A friend had one of these when we were all hiking and I loved the idea: you can drink your own water AND fill up the trough for your dog, all from the same bottle. I bought one that night and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jody K

customer_reviews.title: Great way to have water when walking your dog.
customer_reviews.text: This design is a great way to have water available and a attachment used for pouring the water out of the bottle and placing it onto the ground for the dog to drink. I have bought two for myself and several for friends with dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I love these water bottles, I have 2! They are perfect to take on the go for the dog! Having a bowl attached is great too. I have a small dog so it holds the perfect amount of water in it for her.
customer_reviews.author: Denise S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect water bottle for hiker and dog
customer_reviews.text: I love this bottle. It is not too large and not too small for my beagle and chihuahua. Plus you fill the bowl and put it out for the pups and I can drink from the bottle itself. I like the fact that it is BPA free and it stows in my backpack neatly. Good design and the right price.
customer_reviews.author: Soccer Dad

customer_reviews.title: Perfect when on the go
customer_reviews.text: Just a water bottle with a handy bowl attached - what else could you need? Overall size is great: the reservoir portion adds very little bulk or weight to the bottle and function is perfect in being easy to pull it off to use and re-attach as needed. Much easier to remember things when they're attached so if you know you're going out just fill up the bottle and you're good to go. We have the 600mL version and it's all we need for our puppy but wouldn't have been bad to go with the larger 1L version either as it looks like it's just a bit taller and the 600mL version isn't big at all.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great Bottle for you and your Doggo!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect design allows you to just carry a single bottle for hydrating you and your pet! Pet reservoir detaches from main bottle, so you don't have to have your pet drink from your bottle too! Solid design, yet lightweight and SUPER EASY to CLEAN! You don't need any wire brushes and no need to carry separate bowls, containers, ect! Awesome Job OllyDog!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: A good product.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Works great. Lost my first one and immediately bought another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you are a dog park fanatic...this is the product for you!
customer_reviews.text: I received my first Ollybottle over four years ago for christmas. It survived many many trips to the dog park and our road trips, until my husband dropped it and it cracked...just a bit. But we figured we might as well just get a new one. We got a green on this time. I love love olly bottle. Its wasy to cary and the great thing is u can drink out of it and share with your pup by just taking the tray and pour some water in. I get tons of inquiries at the park about what kind of bottle!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica & Jason Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Happy dog, happy mom
customer_reviews.text: It is nice to have a way to take and dispense water for our dog. After playing at the dog park he is ready for a long drink.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Your pup will love you!!!! Its HOT!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing and easy to carry even as a one handed individual... the 1L size gets a bit cumbersome... I recommend the smaller size!!!
customer_reviews.author: jamessol

customer_reviews.title: Well built bottle, easy to use for small/medium size dogs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bottle to use for my American bulldog/coonhound mix. It was pretty easy to use but I wish the water tray was a little deeper. It was hard for my pup to get all the water from the tray. Might work better for a smaller pup.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy E.

customer_reviews.title: Great for road trips!
customer_reviews.text: We love our OllyDog water bottle. We do road trips with our pups and it makes giving them water mid ride so much easier because it has the completely separated flat bottomed trough which allows the pups to drink without getting water all over the car. If they don’t finish what’s in the trough, it’s fairly easy (although sometimes difficult on a bumpy road) to put the water back into the bottle. It’s plastic so it doesn’t really keep the water cool- that would be my only complaint. If they made one in stainless steel I’d be super excited but for now this works well for us.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle for when you and your pup are ...
customer_reviews.text: Great water bottle for when you and your pup are on the go. The trough fits snug and doesn't come off and the water bottle doesn't leak. I love to hike and bring my dog along so it's necessary to carry enough water for both of us. My friends and family think my dog is spoiled for having her own fancy water bottle but at least she isn't dehydrated! Would definitely buy again if I get another dog or if I lose the current one I have.
customer_reviews.author: chem grad student

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not for large dogs
customer_reviews.text: Its a great looking bottle and I'm sure is just fine for a maltese but not for a larger dog like a Labrador. I ordered the small one and the area that folds down to become a water reservoir is just too small for a large mouth/tongue.
customer_reviews.author: lespejo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: It’s amazing. You don’t have to carry another bowl, and you can drink after your doggie!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Aurelio

customer_reviews.title: Loved it until it broke
customer_reviews.text: I loved this to start and then the plastic strap connecting the lid to the bottle tore and now I have a loose lid that falls whenever I unscrew it. Originally, I loved the design and that the mouth is wide enough to put ice cubes in to keep the water cooler longer and it makes for easy cleaning. If it wasn't for the cheap plastic, I would have given it 5 stars. Now it is difficult to carry and kind of useless.
customer_reviews.author: L.A.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I have an 80 pound lab and we go on long hikes and he gets really thirsty. This very sturdy bottle slips easily into a cinch sack and I can give him whatever when and wherever he wants it. The tray is a good size, easily detachable and easy to clean. I highly recommend this water bottle. I've given it to several friends and they've loved them too!
customer_reviews.author: BenZa

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 6 months
customer_reviews.text: The idea is great so you and your dog can share the same bottle. However, it's square so it does fit in a cup holder. It leaks and the strap broke after 7 months. I won't buy this bottle again.
customer_reviews.author: K. E.

customer_reviews.title: Good for any pet
customer_reviews.text: Living in Florida is hard on my boxer. I walk very early morning and bring her water in this bottle. It is very easy to use and keeps the water cold.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Never leaks
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Never leaks, definitely one of the best designs I've seen for these kinds of water bottle/dish combos. My only minor complaint is that it is often tricky to line up the top right to put it back on - the cap doesn't always thread on right and gets on crooked. It typically isn't a big deal, and I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: I love the convenience of this bottle as now we don't ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the convenience of this bottle as now we don't have to carry both a water bottle and collapsible bowl. The lid screws on tight and because it is attached, the plastic connector makes it easy to carry or connect to something with a carabiner. The bowl portion snaps on and stays on well. I like that I can also share this bottle with my dog. Perfect for longer walks!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Water bottle is durable - much better than the junky cheap thing at PetsMart.
customer_reviews.text: Water bottle is durable and works. I'm satisfied - as is my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Yaffe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome dog water bottle!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great style bottle for large dogs! Any time we travel with our 60# doodle he drinks a ton of water and I love that I can detach the bottle and pour the amount of water I want into it, then he can drink and I don't have to sit and hold the bottle for him. The plastic is super thick so it seems very durable and I love that it's dishwasher safe!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Parks

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: These are durable - it took 3 years of hard use to break the first one. We have several and they are sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: DoubleDdog

customer_reviews.title: WATER FOR YOU AND FOR YOUR DOG TOO!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product! It's a water bottle for me with a specially-shaped "bowl" for my dog that fits down over the neck of the bottle and along one side. I live in Florida, and it's really great not to have to keep trying to come up with something for my dog the drink out of that isn't a hassle to carrywith us on those hot afternoon walks. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: George D. Shaeffer

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased 5 of these over the past 8 years and love them! Easy to clean and convenient wide mouth and well functioning side tray, great for you and your walking companion.
customer_reviews.author: G.

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle and convenient for traveling.
customer_reviews.text: I have a larger water bottle, but lost the trough in our travels. I purchased a small one and it's a perfect size of our Yorkie. I take it whenever we go out and I'm comfortable giving her cold filtered water. Great product, wouldn't hesitate to purchase another, or give to someone as a gift for their pet.
customer_reviews.author: JulieD

customer_reviews.title: Fab
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dog water bottle we've tried, better than cheap ones that end up leaking. Easy to give to dog while hiking or while in a moving car. Bowl is flat bottomed so when at a campsite or hotel it acts as a bowl. In the past I had a defect with my Ollydog and they sent a free replacement.
customer_reviews.author: sewer

customer_reviews.title: Practical and easy to carry dog water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Great little bottle that allows me to bring water for my dog on long walks. Handy snap on drinking “spoon” for drinking so water is not wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No leaking works great
customer_reviews.text: Really like this for hiking. It snaps together well and the drinking piece doesnt take up any extra room. The dog has an easy time drinking from it and it fits in his backpacking pack. One water bottle can last him a moderate-hard 6 mile hike on a warm 60-75 degree day. I have not experienced any leaking and have been storing it full on its side.
customer_reviews.author: Harland Hambrecht

customer_reviews.title: Great design, but poor quality and customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bottle in April 2018 and in June 2018 the lid strap broke. Contacted OllyDog customer service to see if I could buy a new strap but never heard back. Great design but poor quality and none existent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Hitesman

customer_reviews.title: Great functionality, wish it was a little more durable.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. The shape is rectangular-ish which means it doesn't waste a lot of space in your pack like a round Nalgene might. The materials could be a little more durable. The cap cracked on my last one after about 2 years (it was never dropped, it just cracked from normal use).
customer_reviews.author: Shewhorn

customer_reviews.title: not very handy
customer_reviews.text: This shape is not really useful. Hard to clean & it doesn't have any way to hang it on your belt.
customer_reviews.author: penny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all kinds of travel!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I needed when I travel around the city, fly, or beach with my pup. It’s easy to carry around. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Broke too soon
customer_reviews.text: Pretty new and the strap between bottle top and bottle snapped and broke - too new for this to happen. And it happened on a trip. It was only half full too which surprised me. Too late for a return on this - won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Barsky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect on the go water solution
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this bottle. Super easy to use and clean. Love the big bowl space. Even after tons of use the bowl still snaps tight to the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: AWay

customer_reviews.title: Convenient.
customer_reviews.text: I like this bottle because its light weight. My dog is a medium sized dog and has no issue drinking from the bowl. It's convenient to carry on a our walks. I like the fact that I don't have to carry a separate bottle for myself. I don't know how long it will hold up "snapping" back together but worth the price for as long as it lasts. I bought a couple more as gifts for my dog's friends.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great portable dog/waterbowl!
customer_reviews.text: Super handy to have a bowl built in to the design! My dog likes drinking from the small bowl. It is a good amount of water for a fairly long walk. I like having a loop to hold onto. The bowl is easily put on and off- Great design!!! Only slight negative is the cap can sometimes be a little hard to get into the proper place as you twist it back on.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, very sturdy. Keeps the pup hydrated -- and me too!
customer_reviews.text: So useful! I love this and take it for every walk. It's quite sturdy, easy to clean, and the form factor is really nice -- the size is just right in that it holds enough water without being too bulky for a longer walk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my dog!
customer_reviews.text: I love the bottle. It's convenient and easy to carry. Don't have to carry a bowl and water.
customer_reviews.author: Leighkaren Labay

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle for my dog!
customer_reviews.text: This is just the right size for taking water for my dog on a car trip. Very well made and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Janet L.

customer_reviews.title: Great for walks
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves enjoys drinking out of the bowl and while I pour it from the bottle :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Functions great, lid strap broke fast.
customer_reviews.text: We love this water bottle and use it a lot. I’ve had many people at the dog park/beach ask me where I got it. The only reason I gave it four stars instead of five is that the lid strap broke very quickly and now we can’t hang it from a backpack or leash, which is annoying. But otherwise it’s a great bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor pups.
customer_reviews.text: Our goldendoodle quickly picked up how to eat and drink from the tray that nests with the bottle. So convenient for hiking trips with our pup.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty guy

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle for my dog
customer_reviews.text: Love this water bottle for my dog. Lightweight and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn D.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!!! I have bought so many water bottles before this one! This is the winner! Not too heavy (I fill half way which is plenty) easy to refill when your out of you need. Can pour water easily back in if your baby doesn't drink it all and most important DOES NOT leak! Only wish there was pink
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: The idea is great but the attachment is too stiff and hard plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 5 stars but the bottle leaks unless you close the lid just right and after 5 months of use the part attaching the lid to the bottle broke in half (it began to crack after about 2 months). The idea is great but the attachment is too stiff and hard plastic so it was only a matter of time before it was bound to break :(
customer_reviews.author: B Wennlund

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This bottle works great for hikes & strolls with my pup. The tray easily detaches & attaches. The design allows us to share the water. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Second one I have purchased!
customer_reviews.text: Adore these. These work so well for my pups and this is the second one I have purchased. First one made it years before I dropped it by accident and it chipped- my bad, not theirs!
customer_reviews.author: Ian Holtum

customer_reviews.title: Leakage!
customer_reviews.text: Water kept leaking out of the bottle all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Vaheedha Walke

customer_reviews.title: Must have for dog owners
customer_reviews.text: Great water bottle that you can share with your dog on long hikes.
customer_reviews.author: Erin P

customer_reviews.title: Great way to have water for your cannine friend/s on those warm/hot days and you're out and about!
customer_reviews.text: Great size bottle for those hot days when you're out walking the dog/s and they need that drink, especially as one of my dogs is diabetic so it is important that I always have water with me for her and this bottle is perfect with the attachment that acts as the bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: I drink from the bottle and can poor in the dish since our dog does not like ...
customer_reviews.text: I drink from the bottle and can poor in the dish since our dog does not like getting spashed in the face, hook to backpack with a carabineer and dish stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle for two
customer_reviews.text: This water bottle for me and my pup is great, has a drinking tray just for my pup, the lid screws on tight so it doesn't leak. I love it and so does my pup.
customer_reviews.author: Mike in Colorado

customer_reviews.title: my dogs water bowl for long walks
customer_reviews.text: i love that i can take this when we go on long walks and i can share it with the dog keeps water cold for awhile as well
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: Love the cup attachment.
customer_reviews.text: Love this water bottle. Bought this bottle a year ago in august 2019 and still sturdy and durable. Whenever we go out with our little pup we always take this bottle. It has the little cup attachment which is easy for our pup to drink out of at any time. The attachment requires some gentle touch.
customer_reviews.author: Monalisa

customer_reviews.title: There might be a better option out there
customer_reviews.text: There might be a better option out there, but I haven't found it. I can drink from the bottle and share with the pooch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle for you and your dog!
customer_reviews.text: Love this water bottle. It is great because I can drink from it and then pour some into the dish for my dog. Convenient and handy to take on a walk. Cup just snaps right back on. Its great for walks or soccer games or the beach. Love!
customer_reviews.author: 6gr8kids

customer_reviews.title: Great for humans and dogs!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a water bottle that could double for human use! I also wanted a large bottle so this worked great for me. I've used it a couple of times so far and haven't had any issues with the dog 'bowl' piece. It clips firmly into place!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: perfect for a thirsty dog
customer_reviews.text: Great water bottle for dogs. I keep it in the back of my SUV so my dog is never without water. Could come in a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Birds

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, good design
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, good design. The weak link is the strap from the cap to the bottle. I am on my second bottle and both straps broke after about a month of twice daily walks. Would like to see better material used, or provide spares.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyJava

customer_reviews.title: Sam and Izzy's water bottle
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product. Where ever we go and use this other dog walkers say hey that's pretty cool, because it is. conpact, holds a good amount of water and eliminates the need to carry separate bowls.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Best water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Love these - I have one and bought this for a friend who also loves the design. Easy to use. I take it for walks and to do car travel.
customer_reviews.author: AnneMarie Reed

customer_reviews.title: where is the  great carrying case or pouch that used to come withe the bottle?
customer_reviews.text: I really like the bottle, but the old one ! have came with a shoulder strap carrying case which was perfect. Obviously you no longer have that and that makes me sad.
customer_reviews.author: Susi Beene

customer_reviews.title: Love the size!
customer_reviews.text: Love the size for my small dog, and convenient to carry. Rated durability less because my previous water bottle which I had several years the cap split.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck P

customer_reviews.title: Must have for small dog owners
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Perfect for small dog. Bring it with me for walks and going to the dog park.
customer_reviews.author: opus125

customer_reviews.title: Great for your dog!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my pupper a few months ago. Great for walks. I like that it’s a good large size and easy to clean. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Soapey

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Hike with this all the time. I like being able to have my water source and my dog's be the same.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Braden

customer_reviews.title: Favorite dog travel water
customer_reviews.text: Great bottle for a trip. But be sure to bring back up water to refill this bottle for large doggos!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Richard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those summer outings with your canine friend/s
customer_reviews.text: This water bottle has proven very effective when out walking with our two beagles now that we are in summer, there's just the right amount held for the two of them and having the detachable dish to pour the water into means that both can drink together. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: i like it
customer_reviews.text: it’s a genius item. love it. i bought two. plastic is not so study.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana

customer_reviews.title: Best share bottle yet!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well made, doesn't leak. Tray fits snug/tight on bottle and no concerns about it falling off. Our Maltese took to the dish immediately, we'll likely be buying the larger size!
customer_reviews.author: Chad Brozik

customer_reviews.title: Great option!
customer_reviews.text: Love the convenience of these. Favorite travel bowl so far and it's easy to remember!
customer_reviews.author: Carla Braden

customer_reviews.title: Hard plastic easy to break
customer_reviews.text: The mouth leaked. Returned it. Hard plastic easy to break. Rim of lid also was cracked.
customer_reviews.author: AmyBalbier

customer_reviews.title: German Shepherd approved
customer_reviews.text: Such a great product with a large drinking bowl, this product is perfect for our German Shepherd.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemar

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and carry. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very handy and easy to use. Having the little dish attached is so handy to remove and let dog drying instead of Mekong the drink while pouring.
customer_reviews.author: Monica larsen

customer_reviews.title: Great idea. Only problem I got distracted at a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great idea. Only problem I got distracted at a rest stop and forgot to get the trough. Have to order another one
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Minerich

customer_reviews.title: This Water Bottle Is H2Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had ours for years. Exceptionally practical. Ordered one for a friend’s dog, as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice for dog to drink, hook to backpack with a carabineer
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Olly dogs be jealous.
customer_reviews.text: This is bada**. All my dog date friends are jealous. I also usually have extra water when we get home, and it holds enough I'm okay sharing with my friend's dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: shrunk in dishwasher!
customer_reviews.text: The water bottle claims to be dishwasher safe, but the bowl attachment would not fit back on the waterbottle after going through the dishwasher
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love my Olly Dog
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my Olly Dog, but the loop attaching the lid to the bottle snapped after only 2 months and a handful of uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Practically the only thing my dog will drink out of on a trip. She laps it right up and any that she doesn't drink can go back into the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Ilo B. Gassoway

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this bottle, we use it every single day in summer.
customer_reviews.author: Lomo

customer_reviews.title: Holds 32ounces of water
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter to use for the dogs when she hikes. She loves them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well, cap is a bit hard to screw on --> leaks sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Sky

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Very convenient. And detachable bowl only comes off when I want it to.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Champlin

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: it was way too cumbersome for park and trail hikes, leaked. I gave it away
customer_reviews.author: J. More

customer_reviews.title: Can’t drop it whatsoever
customer_reviews.text: So the thing about this water bottle is that if you drop it (which you probably will with a dog on the leash) it instantly breaks the bowl part leaving it completely useless.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: I've found one that is perfect! It's sturdy
customer_reviews.text: After previously trying several types of travel water bottles for my Miniature Schnauzer, I've found one that is perfect! It's sturdy, attractive, and it doesn't leak. Baron and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: tealady

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as promised dog is very happpy with it so it is all good
customer_reviews.author: Peter M

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great idea but it leaks if you don't leave the bottom stand.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: My dog really loves this and so do I. ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog really loves this and so do I. It makes it easier to carry water for her. The only downside is that if you fill it too much it will spill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bowl is a little small, but works well and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bowl is a little small, but works well and is extremely convenient to carry on a hike or to dog park!
customer_reviews.author: A. Coughlin

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband to take while walking the dog. Works out great for them. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Already Broken
customer_reviews.text: Only used this a few times, and the strap connecting the cap to the bottle already broke in half. Cheap. Now I have to look for a different bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Alex M.

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: This water bottle is perfect for our needs and the dog drank out of it the first time it was introduced.
customer_reviews.author: Maternal Optimist

customer_reviews.title: Will order again
customer_reviews.text: Slightly smaller than I wanted but it works perfect! Took my dog for a 5 mile hike and this helped keep him hydrated! Easy to clean and use.
customer_reviews.author: angelica

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Worked amazingly until my wife left it at a dog park....
customer_reviews.author: Richard

product_meta.title: OllyBottle Portable Travel Walking Hiking “No Touch” Water Bottle for Dog Pets by OllyDog
product_meta.description: Size:1L| Color:GrassThe large ollybottle is the perfect solution for you and your dog to share water on the go! Designed for slobber-free sharing with large dogs. Simply Remove The detachable bowl and pour water from your bottle into their bowl. Easily snap back into place when finished. The attached cap is made out of a rubberized plastic with a logo grip detailing for easy opening. the ollybottle is a patent pending design and made from a super durable, lightweight, dishwasher safe, BPA-free Eastman Tritan plastic to keep you and your dog happy and healthy.
feature_bullets: VEGAN NON-TOXIC MATRETIAL: BPA free Eastman Tritan plastic; Dishwasher safe for happy healthy life
EXCLUSIVE PATENTED DESIGN: Slobber-free sharing SMALL/MEDIUM/LARGE dogs with DETACHABLE bowl
DURABLE and LIGHTWEIGHT perect for Travel, Walking or Hiking Outdoor
LEAK PROOF and Easily snap back when finished with attached Cap made from rubberized plastic
